```{r setup, include=FALSE}

knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
library(readr)
library(dplyr)
library(tidyr)
library(lme4)
library(effects)

```

```{r data}
words <- read_csv("task/task-src/words.csv")

icelandic <- read_csv("results/results.csv", na = "--undefined--") %>%
    left_join(y = words) %>%
    mutate_if(is.character, as.factor)
```

```{r}
model <- lmer(dur_vowel ~ aspiration + place + manner + syllables + vowel +
                  (1|speaker) + (1|word), data = icelandic
              )
```
